meanings.definition: The state or quality of being thin or slender.
meanings.sent1: Her leanness made her a great runner.
meanings.sent2: The model's leanness was admired in the fashion industry.
meanings.sent3: Despite his leanness, he could eat a whole pizza by himself.
meanings.sent4: The leanness of the tree branches reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The cheetah's leanness allowed it to swiftly chase its prey.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of lacking excess fat or flesh.
meanings.sent1: The doctor advised him to maintain his leanness for better health.
meanings.sent2: The leanness of the meat made it a healthier option.
meanings.sent3: Her leanness saved her from getting stuck in the narrow passage.
meanings.sent4: The leanness of the budget forced them to prioritize their spending.
meanings.sent5: The leanness of the soil affected the growth of the plants.
